snippet.title: Steamworld Heist 2 Launch Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
Thunderful sent over the launch trailer for Steamworld Heist 2, the turn-based steampunk battler with an upgradable ragtag crew. It's out now on PC and consoles.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#Steamworldheist2 #FutureGamesShow #FGS #gamescom
